response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value, not just financially but also in terms of its unique features and benefits. I understand its significance to you, given its worth of $800,000 to you personally. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a fair price of $750,000 for the product. This offer allows you to secure this valuable asset at a competitive rate, while also ensuring my business gains a fair return on investment. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of concluding this mutually beneficial deal soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 750000}
